ai-patthana15.8:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, that is to say, the Lord of the Death,
ai-patthana15.8:1.1_0: The cause should be given up and not be given up through seeing reasons.
ai-patthana15.8:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.8:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.8:3.1_0: You shouldn’t give up without a cause or reason to give up not seeing its development.
ai-patthana15.8:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
